text: The Northern Ireland Ambulance Service (NIAS) is the ambulance service for Northern Ireland, United Kingdom. It was created on 1 April 1995. Around 1000 people work for the NIAS. ==Related pages== * Emergency medical services in the United Kingdom ==References== Category:Transport in Northern Ireland Category:1995 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:20th-century establishments in Northern Ireland Category:Emergency services in the United Kingdom
title: Northern Ireland Ambulance Service
